OPINION

LEWIS, VICE PRESIDING JUDGE:
¶1 The State of Oklahoma appeals to this Court, pursuant to this Court's Rule 6.1, from the order of a reviewing judge affirming an adverse ruling of the preliminary hearing magistrate in Case Nos. CF-2016-844, CF-...
